original_title: The Three Stooges: Lost Comedy Treasures
overview: The Three Stooges are in "rare" form in this compilation of hard-to-find footage, featuring movei and TV appearanes formerly lost, misplaced, or literally walled up in a fim vault, never to be seen again -- until now!  You'll see their first film with Curly, "Hollywood on Parade", and his only surviving appearance with the Stooges in color, "Nertsy Rhymes", one of several recently rediscovered MGM films unseen for fifty years.  Plus their 1949 ABC-TV pilot, "Jerks of All Trades"; movie trailers; rare commercials from the 1960s: and one of their final TV appearances, "Danny Thomas Presents the Comics", a 1965 color special with Martha Raye.
title: The Three Stooges: Lost Comedy Treasures
